Service is friendly and fast.  The staff gives you a paper menu with a pen and you just check the items you want - easy and efficient.  The food is good.  I ordered the chicken tikka burger --it was a bit dry because it was white meat that had been seasoned and ground up into a patty. The toppings were fresh and interesting.  The French fries seemed fresh as well.  My two other friends both ordered beef burgers and enjoyed them.
